TopicTitle: Sharing work when it is WIP?

Articles.Content: I like share my work when it is WIP, i tried to use GitHub but it was too complicated, so does anybody have diffrent wqay to share work or easy quick setup tutorial to github (i had 2 days find good tutorial to windows)?

Did you try to use either GitHub [Windows client](https://windows.github.com/) or [SourceTree](https://www.sourcetreeapp.com/) ? The github client makes it really easy to handle the common git task and sourcetree allows for more complex stuff once you get used to git. 

And if you need tutorials : [git cmd line + github](http://www.bogotobogo.com/cplusplus/Git/Git_GitHub_Express.php) & [SourceTree](http://www.bogotobogo.com/cplusplus/Git/Git_GitHub_Source_Tree_1_Commit_Push.php)
